description:
The Leading Java and Kotlin IDE

Code-centric IDE, focused on your productivity. Full Java EE support, deep code understanding, best debugger, refactorings, everything right out of the box...
IntelliJ IDEA 2024.3 EAP 5 is here, featuring:
- Kotlin: Non-local ‘break’ and ‘continue’ statements in lambdas (Beta)
- Find in Files: Exclude Git-ignored files from search results
- Highlight selected text across files
Learn more in our blog post.
